issue.title: [FlightRPC] Deprecate old authentication mechanism
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10452](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10452). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
After ARROW-9804 is implemented across all languages we should remove the old authentication mechanisms.
